name: ASAuthorization
desc: The encapsulation of a successful authorization by a controller.

items.name: var provider: ASAuthorizationProvider
items.desc: The provider that created the request that resulted in the successful authorization.

items.name: var credential: ASAuthorizationCredential
items.desc: Information provided about a user after successful authentication.

items.name: protocol ASAuthorizationCredential
items.desc: An interface that all credentials share.

items.name: struct ASAuthorization.Scope
items.desc: The kinds of contact information that can be requested from the user.

items.name: struct ASAuthorization.OpenIDOperation
items.desc: The kinds of operations that you can perform with OpenID authentication.
